text: Mary Marguerite "Leneen" Forde (born 12 May 1935) is an Canadian-born Australian educator and politician. She was a former Chancellor of Griffith University. She served as the 22nd Governor of Queensland from 1992 until 1997. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Australian academics Category:Governors of Queensland Category:People from Ottawa
title: Leneen Forde
